name: Midnight (itch) (Renzo Omar Bendezu Pautrat)
description:
Many tasks, many jobs to do, share the chores inside the mobile castle to be able to invade the enemy nation

Arcade & Multiplayer Arcade Game similar to TowerDefense Game.

use (w/a/s/d, space, and e) for one player and (keys, 1,0) for the other player, run and climb for all the mobile castle doing the neccesary task for keep the castle working 

Team Midnight:

Renzo Bendezu Pautrat - Programmer & Designer

Favio Cuya - Programmer & Designer

Madeleine Ayquipa - Artist

#trytogheter

#totem
